title: 8 Dead In Pro-Iran Protest At US Consulate In Pak, Most Had Bullet Wounds
summary_full: At least eight people were killed during pro-Iran protests at the United States consulate in the Pakistan megacity of Karachi on Sunday, a rescue service spokesman told news agency AFP.
summary_public: At least eight people were killed during pro-Iran protests at the United States consulate in the Pakistan megacity of Karachi on Sunday, a rescue service spokesman told news agency AFP.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: pro-Iran protests at the United States consulate in Pakistan
